comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.created_time: February 11, 2023, 02:04:17 AMLast edit: February 11, 2023, 04:37:45 AM by Little Mouse
comments.body: Nice thread, Nice service.It's better to link up or share telegram handle of the projects you have managed/moderated. This way potential clients would be able to check out the community, verify etc.Just my 2 cents.Quote from: shasan on February 11, 2023, 02:19:04 AMOP might not have worked earlier. If op worked earlier then it would be better if op added previous experience.He has added Robotera, TAMADOGE in the portoflio.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Welcome to the community management service. On your website, you have added email but the icon you have added on the email section seems the icon of telegram. Would you like to change the icon to an email icon?Quote from: Little Mouse on February 11, 2023, 02:04:17 AMIt's better to link up or share telegram handle of the projects you have managed/moderated.OP might not have worked earlier. If op worked earlier then it would be better if op added previous experience.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: The service looks really great  GxSTxV is one of the pioneers of our local board in the forum, and what I like is his culture and knowledge are endless, and he is also cooperative and innovative. Frankly, if I had a real project, I would have hired him in the first place because he is a truly professional person and he will do his utmost to manage & moderate the project communities and help and push the project to achieve its goals because he is loving and dedicated to his work and can work for long hours or more throughout the week.good luck to you.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on February 11, 2023, 02:04:17 AMNice thread, Nice service.It's better to link up or share telegram handle of the projects you have managed/moderated. This way potential clients would be able to check out the community, verify etc. Just my 2 cents. Thank you LM that's great to hear I put a lot of effort into making it the best it could be. I took your advice and added the links of every project.Quote from: shasan on February 11, 2023, 02:19:04 AMWelcome to the community management service. On your website, you have added email but the icon you have added on the email section seems the icon of telegram. Would you like to change the icon to an email icon? OP might not have worked earlier. If op worked earlier then it would be better if op added previous experience.Hehe thank you for bringing this to my attention . I changed it now with an Email icon  All the projects I mentioned in my thread are either previous or present managed projectsQuote from: albon on February 11, 2023, 05:04:30 AMThe service looks really great  GxSTxV is one of the pioneers of our local board in the forum, and what I like is his culture and knowledge are endless, and he is also cooperative and innovative. Frankly, if I had a real project, I would have hired him in the first place because he is a truly professional person and he will do his utmost to manage & moderate the project communities and help and push the project to achieve its goals because he is loving and dedicated to his work and can work for long hours or more throughout the week.good luck to you.Thank you so much for the positive and encouraging review! I am honored to be recognized as a pioneer on the local board and to receive such high praise for my culture, knowledge, and professional approach.I appreciate all your kind words. I wish you all the best in your endeavors as well.

comments.author: Sebas.tian
comments.body: Indeed you have the capacity and skills to deliver a good project GxSTxV, because I took my time to going through some of the projects you have managed and moderate in the past which are excellent. I think, many companies will definitely need your service because you have what other managers don't have.
